title.en: A Prayer to Sonam Senge, Omniscient Sun of the Teachings

text.en: Namo guru-puṇya-siṃhāya!1
All-knowing Mañjuśrī, supreme lion of speech,
text.en-trans: künkhyen jampal mawé sengé chok

text.en: In order to become a sun for the tradition of Kunga,2
text.en-trans: küngé ringluk nyinmor jepé lé

text.en: You perfectly accomplished Samantabhadra’s aspirations.
text.en-trans: kuntuzangpö mönlam rab drubpa

text.en: All-seeing Mañjughoṣa guru, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: künzik jamyang lamar solwa deb

text.en: Always indivisible from Mañjuśrī—Gentle Splendour,
text.en-trans: döné jampé pal dang yer miché

text.en: You took birth as scholars and adepts in India and Tibet,
text.en-trans: pak bö khedrub dumé kyewa zhé

text.en: And then you took the form of this spiritual friend.
text.en-trans: dengdir gewé shé kyi kur tön né

text.en: Vajra holder of the three sets of vows, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: sumden dorjé dzinpar solwa deb

text.en: In the delightful palace of renunciation and discipline,
text.en-trans: ngejung tsultrim khang zang nyamgawar

text.en: You are the great son and heir, an altruistic bodhisattva,
text.en-trans: zhenpen changchub sempé tuwo ché

text.en: The Lord of Secrets sustaining vajra pride.
text.en-trans: sangwé dakpo dorjé nyem changwa

text.en: Guru who embodies the three families, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: rik sum dü zhal lamar solwa deb

text.en: Master of all the profound and vast topics of knowledge,
text.en-trans: zab dang gyaché sheja tamché khyen

text.en: Unobstructed in exposition, debate and composition,
text.en-trans: ché tsö tsom la chaktok dribpa dral

text.en: You are a magnificent ornament enhancing the Land of Snows.
text.en-trans: gangchen dzepé gyen chok chenpo ni

text.en: Peerless and unrivalled one, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsungda mepa khyé la solwa deb

text.en: You understood the precise meaning of Mother Prajñāpāramitā,
text.en-trans: yum dön gongpa jizhin tuk su chü

text.en: And showed yourself to be glorious Dharmakīrti in person,
text.en-trans: palden chökyi drakpa ngö su nang

text.en: As articulate in expression as Vasubandhu himself.
text.en-trans: yik gi nyenpo zhindu jöpa dak

text.en: Great crown adornment of scholars, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: khepé tsukgyen chenpor solwa deb

text.en: You reconciled the visions of both Maitreya and Nāgārjuna,
text.en-trans: jam lu gongpa galmé chik tu drub

text.en: Without falling into eternalist or nihilist extremes,
text.en-trans: takché tröpé ta la ma lhung zhing

text.en: And revealed the great Middle Way of unity.
text.en-trans: zungjuk uma chenpo tön dzepa

text.en: Second Lord of Sages for the Land of Snows, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: jangchok tubwang nyipar solwa deb

text.en: With a stream of ripening empowerments and liberating instructions
text.en-trans: jikdral tob kyi gönpo birupé

text.en: In the tradition of Virūpa, that fearless and mighty guardian,
text.en-trans: zhé zhung sung ngak mindrol chugyün gyi

text.en: You brought fortunate disciples an abundant four-kāya harvest.
text.en-trans: kalden ku zhi lo tok gyé dzepa

text.en: Most precious and noble one, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: jetsün rinpoche la solwa deb

text.en: In reality, you are none other than mighty Vajradhara,
text.en-trans: ngepé döndu dorjé chang wang dang

text.en: The lord of each and every maṇḍala,
text.en-trans: tadé ma chi kyilkhor kün gyi dak

text.en: Clarifying without error the meaning of tantra and secret mantra.
text.en-trans: sang ngak gyü dön manor sal dzepa

text.en: Great lord of yogins, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk chenpor solwa deb

text.en: In this and all my other lives to come,
text.en-trans: kyewa di dang kyewa zhendak tu

text.en: May I be blessed by your secret body, speech and mind,
text.en-trans: khyé kyi sangwa sum gyi jinlab zhuk

text.en: And as I expound upon the intent of the victorious buddhas,
text.en-trans: gyalwé gongpa jizhin chepa la

text.en: May I be indivisible from you, the all-knowing guru.
text.en-trans: künkhyen lama nyi dang yermé shok

text.en: With powerful intellect capable of retaining, explaining and propagating
text.en-trans: sönam chenpö pal gyi lek sung tsok

text.en: Your excellent teachings that have the splendour of great merit,
text.en-trans: dzin ché pel la lodrö tuden zhing

text.en: And with the leonine roar of comprehensive and universal victory
text.en-trans: chok lé nampar gyalwé sengé dré

text.en: May I overcome the bestial hordes of mistaken views.
text.en-trans: ta ngen ridak tsok nam jom gyur chik
